price: auch wenn jedes Zeichen zu ihnen käme -, bis sie die schmerzhafte Strafe sehen.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
